posts.postText: is the server down i cant connect and its not on the server list

yes, sadly TTT and jail are being hit with a ddos attack.this could go on for days because it a drdos.so you might want to find a substitute for gmod in the meantime.not saying it will be gone for days just it is a high possibility with the type of attack.
well i hope it recovers a while back a ddos attack happened then the server was never the same not to nnjg but to another server
Gmod dies whenever the server dies.  I guess its TF2 time!

since january ive seen 2 ddos's and 2 drdos's, we recover swiftly and continue as normal our servers should be fine.

dont wory
